title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 253 - Disciplinary Hearing
content:

State Regulations
§ 253.1 - Establishment of the disciplinary hearing officer
§ 253.2 - Non-english speaking and sensorially disabled inmates
§ 253.3 - Formal charge
§ 253.4 - Assistance
§ 253.5 - Inmate witnesses
§ 253.6 - Method of determination
§ 253.7 - Dispositions and mandatory surcharge

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 253

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§70, 112, 138, 146

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
